snippet.title: The Final Prize Is Soup - Official Steam Announcement Trailer
snippet.description: Learn more about The Final Prize Is Soup in this trailer for the upcoming horror yuri visual novel. The Final Prize Is Soup follows the story of a woman who wakes up after a disastrous break-up to find she's dead. Luckily, (or unluckily), she's been given a chance to turn back the clock and avert her death–as long as she can pass a series of death games in the afterlife. The Final Prize Is Soup will be available on Steam on August 27, 2024.
